roleset.name: declare boundaries
roleset.note: DEMARCATE-V NOTES: Frame created by Arrick (from demarcate.01-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: * Looking at it from the perspective of lifestyle, Taiwanese do not usually clearly demarcate their personal space, and are usually pretty comfortable with the idea of * being contactable at any time day or night.
example.arg: * Looking at it from the perspective of lifestyle,
